title: 38: Minicast - The "D" Word
itunes:title: 38: Minicast - The "D" Word
itunes:subtitle: In this week's minicast, Matt reflects on a death that is close to him and how we use or don't use words about "dead". We talk a little with Rabbi Physllis Sommer to help explain.
description:
In this week's minicast, Matt reflects on a death that is close to him and how we use or don't use words about "dead". We talk a little with Rabbi Physllis Sommer to help explain.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
